resources.string: Rules of the game: there will be three digits in front of you, two from the bottom and one from the top, two of them will benumbers. It is necessary that the sum of the numbers from the two lower digits be equal to the number in the upper figure. To do this, insert the missing number.\n\nExample: in the upper circle there is a number 7, in one from below there is a question mark, and in the other there is a number 4. So, in place of the question mark there should be the number 3, because 3 + 4 = 7
The required number of correct answers: %s
The required percentage of correct answers: %s\%%
